description: Get a list of recently played videos for user

response_fields.name: is_recently_updated
response_fields.description: Boolean. True when resource was updated

requests.curl:

	-H "Api-Version: v1" \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJ3d3cuYmV0YS1tYWxpbWFydHYuZWxhc3RpY2JlYW5zdGFsay5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE1OTE1Njc2NzkuMjc5MTE5MywidXNlciI6eyJpZCI6MSwibG9naW4iOiJkb2N0b3IxMDgud2hvQGV4YW1wbGUuY29tIiwiZW1haWwiOiJkb2N0b3IxMDgud2hvQGV4YW1wbGUuY29tIiwib3JpZ2luIjoibG9jYWwiLCJwcmVtaXVtIjpmYWxzZX0sImV4cCI6MTU5MTY1NDA3OX0.38O1_kWU3dbOo5lSn09HLvutQDv85z3L2AwkoqV7doXt1EBkJs4mVFLy7VlyNMSBhVS1wUAvgEXVNtGfep4ABQ"
